name: Asteroid Hopper
description:
Asteroid Hopper is a retro style Asteroid arcade game!

* 4 Playable Maps

* High Scores 

* 2 Playable Ship factions 

* Power Ups 

* Asteroid Hopping

I made this game in a few days for the Game Jam  

The Dream Arcade Archive

(https://itch.io/jam/dream-arcade-archive)

Made and Developed By - Medwards Art 

(Thanks for playing my Game it means the world to me!

I hope to someday make bigger and better games!)
